name: Rapid Delivery (Andrew Spinks)
description:
Hey Mates!

This is the year 1 project that I was apart of. The team consisted of 2 designers, 2 programmers and 2 artists. This is an endless runner style game, about delivering tea to pedestrians.

I did the menu programming, system design and direction.

I'm very proud of what the team was able to accomplish in the time that we had. We all learned very valuable lessons about how to work in a dynamic team environment. 

Thank you for checking it out. Like always, C&C is very welcome.

Thanks Mates!

Andrew.
